bucket.attachService: Create a new bucket and get immediate access to Web3 storage.
bucket.deleteConfirm: Are you sure that you want to delete {num} selected bucket(s)?

bucket.infoNew: Enter the desired name and description for the bucket so you can easily recognize it.
bucket.name: Bucket name
bucket.noActiveService: You need a storage bucket before you can start storing files.

file.deletedFiles: Deleted files from your bucket will appear in this list.
file.dragAndDrop: Drag & drop or click to upload files
file.pinningToCrust: This file is being pinned to Crust Network. While uploading, the file is only visible in the "All Files" tab.
file.stillUploading: This file is being pinned to Crust Network. When it’s done, you will be able to see file’s IPFS details.

ipfs.ipfsInfo: Used to access content via CIDs
ipfs.ipfsLinkInfo: Link, where requested content can be accessed
ipfs.ipnsInfo: Used to access content via IPNS name
ipfs.secretInfo: Secret for project, used to generate a token to access the content via the IPFS gateway
ipfs.subdomainInfo: If specified, content on ipfs can be access as subdomain.
ipfs.title: IPFS Gateway

ipns.create-description: Each time you upload a file to IPFS, a new CID and URL are created. To change the file’s content without changing the URL, you can utilize a fixed URL directory (an IPNS record).
ipns.delete: Are you sure that you want to delete IPNS?
ipns.disabled: IPNS is disabled. This item needs a CID.
ipns.how-to:
How to add a fixed URL to directory:
1. Create a folder within your storage bucket to store the mutable content.
2. Create an IPNS record pointing to the folder.
3. Upload mutable content to the folder.
4. Share the fixed IPNS URL
ipns.name: Name
ipns.subtitle: Create a new IPNS record
ipns.title: IPNS

shortUrl.shortUrlInfo: Please save this generated shorthand URL.
shortUrl.title: Short URL

storage.link-tooltip: The file is being pinned. Please wait up to 1 minute for it to become available at the URL.
storage.wrapFilesDescription: If you want to wrap files to a directory please type the name of the directory below. If you don't want to do it just skip this process.
